I've only made it to Bronze 3, and will continue to try this season, but I'm not playing ranked next season. I'd probably be gold if not for the huge amount of trolls and feeders. I'm honestly not sure it's possible for me to get to silver. I'll be on a 10 win streak, then suddenly lose every game to feeding morons. Like why was it so easy the first 10 games, was it just to troll me Riot? So honestly, I don't think I, or majority of Ranked players in Bronze, care about a fucking recall recolor. What we care about is a stable system for Ranked. So please, stop focusing your attention on "rewarding" players in higher ranks and try fixing what is broken in lower ranks. Thanks, bye.

Have you considered maybe you're not as good as you think you are?

I would literally do nothing and still win games just because I didn't go off myself, I even tried to put my team in bad situations but the enemy team wouldn't take advantage. People in bronze and silver just have zero game sense and decision making. I'm not a good player by any account.

This is completely true! The problem in lower elo's is players instantly tilt as soon as they see their top laner is 0/3. "GG FF@20" Now, in diamond, this may be a problem because players understand how to use their lead to carry and end a game quickly. Lower elo players do not! Just dont tilt, and wait out the game. Chances are, the game is going to reach that 45 minutes where the top laners massive lead is now completely irrelevant. Play some late game scaling champions, and you will win most of your games.
And farm, even as a bronzie it saddens me to see matches end 45 minutes and im one of 3 people with over 250 farm

You, sir, just made me post my FIRST COMMENT EVER!. Everything you typed is nothing but the truth. I always tell them that i've came back and won in a much worst situation (2 inhibs down). I wish I can post your words of wisdom onto a bulletin board for my ELO aka Bronze aka the final circle of Hell.

If you truly want to climb in the rankings, you need to change your attitude ASAP! You can't expect to climb with the attitude that your team sucks and you deserve to be higher. There is a reason why several people can do "unranked to challenger" streams. Its because they have the skill's to carry a game. I feel this goes overlooked by many players. You can be very good at the game, but still not have the specific skill set to actually carry. Work on your champion pool, find champions who snowball early and can make pressure around the map.

Yes, there are lots of trolls and feeders at low elo. However, let me give you this:

When you enter into a game, you can rule out the possibility of being a troll/feeder yourself, right? That's pretty good news for your team! That means there are only 4 potential feeders/trolls on your team, since you can rule yourself out. However, for the enemy team, there are FIVE potential feeders/trolls, since you can't rule any of them out. ODDS ARE IN YOUR FAVOR! On the macro scale the enemy teams you play against will have more trolls/feeders than your team does. Which means unless you have a lot to improve on, low elo is especially easy to move up in due to the easy games where the enemy has trolls/feeders. Looks like you have a lot to improve on. (Same for me)

Of course, there's the possibility that he actually is a troll/feeder/(tilted toxic feeder).
However, if he's none of those and actually better than most players at that elo, then climbing out should be really easy.
